EmailTemplate.description: Actual SO Delivery to the Client.
EmailTemplate.name: Service Order Delivery - Actual
EmailTemplate.subject: Service Order- Actual Delivery Acknowledgement.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Compras,
Thank you for your business with Invixium!
Reference to your PO Number: 14499
SO#: SOAC003090 Unique ID Number: 00054830
Please make a note of the assigned Unique ID number that would allow you to activate associated software services at your convenience. You must keep this email info as a record for future reference and confirmation of IXM software/services delivery. These services may include IXM time, IXM Link, IXM Health, IXM Convert, ASC, or others as applicable per PO/SO number.
The following services are included:
1. ASC WEB 20 (January 28, 2024 to January 27, 2025) â€“ 1 No.
Please find below the activation details:
Activation Type:
Activation ID:
Activation Key:
Expiry Date:
Reference Machine Key:
Please find attached a screenshot to activate ASC in IXM Web.
Once activated, let us know your convenient time to connect over remote/MS Teams to troubleshoot the issue.
